title: a11y.css
name: a11y.css
description: This file aims to warn front-end devs about mistakes and potential accessibility failures - but it also helps to rate client-side code and to spot its weaknesses.

scripts.docs: npm run docs:build && npm run docs:prepare && npm run docs:deploy
scripts.docs:prepare: cp -r docs/Hologram/tests .tmpdocs && rsync -avh docs/SassDoc/ .tmpdocs && rm -rf .tmpdocs/sass && rm -rf .tmpdocs/js
